content: I'd be very grateful for a review of this as I'm expecting to need some of its lemmas in a day or two. Happy to return the favour if someone else has a PR in need of review.
Again, those look good to me. Whoever will bors it needs to watch out for #9268 as it will definitely conflict.
What did you mean with +80, -4? Do you need the Minkowski functional in #9097?

Yaël Dillies said:

What did you mean with +80, -4?

I used to work in a software house and we would always decorate our review requests with the number of lines added / removed.
Wait no, that's not what 9103 - 4 is :sweat_smile:. But anyway I assume you didn't mean #9183 and #9099?

Oliver Nash said:

I used to work in a software house and we would always decorate our review requests with the number of lines added / removed.

Nice idea
This PR was sent to bors yesterday but failed because of an incompatible change to master. I've merged master and it has passed CI so I think it should succeed if we send it again.
